name: COVID_19TestsForSARS_CoV_2GenomicSequence
title: COVID_19 (Tests for SARS_CoV_2 Genomic Sequence)
description: This value set contains some provisional codes created for the COVID-19 response. It may be incomplete, as not all provisional COVID-19 codes are available in VSAC at the time of publication. Please contact the CSTE RCKMS Content Team for a complete list of codes to be included in this value set.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for lab test names that may be ordered or ‘observed’ for detection of SARS-CoV-2 genomic sequence or gene mutation by Molecular genetics method.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: SARS-like Coronavirus; Coronavirus 2),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
